title: The B-52s Announce 2025 Las Vegas Residency Dates
description: The band will bring their celebrated residency back to the Venetian for five new dates in 2025. The B-52s Announce 2025 Las Vegas Residency Dates Jo Vito
author: Jo Vito
excerpt: The B-52s will be returning to Las Vegas in April 2025 for more residency dates at the Venetian. Read more and learn how to get tickets.
text: The B-52s are returning to Las Vegas. The beloved band has announced that they are extending their residency at the Venetian with five new dates scheduled for April 2025. Continuing a run of sold-out shows that began in 2023, the new dates will see the band return to The Venetian Theatre inside The Venetian Resort Las Vegas to perform a set of hits, including “Rock Lobster,” “Private Idaho,” “Love Shack,” and more. The dates will land between April 11th and 19th, and will follow their final 2024 dates at the venue (scheduled for later this month). See the full list of their upcoming live dates below. Get The B-52s Tickets Here Tickets for The B-52s new residency shows will go on sale via a Live Nation pre-sale opening on Thursday, November 14th at 10:00 a.m. PT (use access code BEATS). After that, the general on-sale will open via Ticketmaster on Friday, November 15th at 10:00 a.m. PT. First launched in May 2023, the B-52s residency came as the cap-off of their “Farewell Tour.” Since then, the shows have been a highlight attraction of the Strip. In other B-52s news, Kate Pierson released a new solo album, Radios and Rainbows, this past September. Earlier in the year, she listed her Joshua Tree compound, dubbed “Kate’s Lazy Desert,” for sale. For more, listen to Pierson talk about the band’s hit “Love Shack” on the Consequence podcast, The Story Behind the Song. The B-52s 2024 – 2025 Tour Dates: 11/13 – Las Vegas, NV @ The Venetian Theatre 11/15 – Las Vegas, NV @ The Venetian Theatre 11/16 – Las Vegas, NV @ The Venetian Theatre 12/14 – Athens, GA @ Akins Arena 04/11 – Las Vegas, NV @ The Venetian Theatre 04/12 – Las Vegas, NV @ The Venetian Theatre 04/16 – Las Vegas, NV @ The Venetian Theatre 04/18 – Las Vegas, NV @ The Venetian Theatre 04/19 – Las Vegas, NV @ The Venetian Theatre
html:
The B-52s are returning to Las Vegas. The beloved band has announced that they are extending their residency at the Venetian with five new dates scheduled for April 2025.

Continuing a run of sold-out shows that began in 2023, the new dates will see the band return to The Venetian Theatre inside The Venetian Resort Las Vegas to perform a set of hits, including “Rock Lobster,” “Private Idaho,” “Love Shack,” and more. The dates will land between April 11th and 19th, and will follow their final 2024 dates at the venue (scheduled for later this month). See the full list of their upcoming live dates below.

Get The B-52s Tickets Here

Tickets for The B-52s new residency shows will go on sale via a Live Nation pre-sale opening on Thursday, November 14th at 10:00 a.m. PT (use access code BEATS). After that, the general on-sale will open via Ticketmaster on Friday, November 15th at 10:00 a.m. PT.

First launched in May 2023, the B-52s residency came as the cap-off of their “Farewell Tour.” Since then, the shows have been a highlight attraction of the Strip.

In other B-52s news, Kate Pierson released a new solo album, Radios and Rainbows, this past September. Earlier in the year, she listed her Joshua Tree compound, dubbed “Kate’s Lazy Desert,” for sale.

For more, listen to Pierson talk about the band’s hit “Love Shack” on the Consequence podcast, The Story Behind the Song.

The B-52s 2024 – 2025 Tour Dates:
11/13 – Las Vegas, NV @ The Venetian Theatre
11/15 – Las Vegas, NV @ The Venetian Theatre
11/16 – Las Vegas, NV @ The Venetian Theatre
12/14 – Athens, GA @ Akins Arena
04/11 – Las Vegas, NV @ The Venetian Theatre
04/12 – Las Vegas, NV @ The Venetian Theatre
04/16 – Las Vegas, NV @ The Venetian Theatre
04/18 – Las Vegas, NV @ The Venetian Theatre
04/19 – Las Vegas, NV @ The Venetian Theatre
